descriptionHtml:
[size=7][u] [center] [heading] [color=red] [b] Dawnfang And Duskfang REBORN [/b] [/color] [/heading] [/center][/u][/size]

[size=8][u] [center] [color=red] [b] DAWNGUARD IS REQUIRED [/b] [/color] [/center][/u][/size]   [color=yellow][center][u] no assets have been used from oblivion, except for the idea of the weapon and name [/u] [/center][/color]
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25225-1-1353596853.png[/img][/center]

==================================================================================================================================
Description of my mod:
this is an attempt to bring back my favorite and one of the most unique weapons from shivering isles: dawnfang/duskfang. 
[line]Update:
All forms of the blade now have a custom near death effect (courtesy of ZeroEternalz) and the blades now have a scabbard
Quick Update: thanks to Sabourok for spotting a problem when the blades transform, causing an invisible sword to appear and dawnfang still available in inventory 
==================================================================================================================================

[line][center][size=7][color=red]ATTENTION[/color][/size][/center]
[center]if you would like a non-dawnguard dependent version, you can find it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27873/]here[/url][line][/center]

[quote]Dude, we were just playing Oblivion and saying \'i wish this sword was in skyrim\' so kudos!?[/quote]
  --What a coincidence XD

[center][youtube]uzk0CBGzA7c[/youtube][/center]

[center]since i dont know how to create quests, i have created a book placed around the world. the book can be found in the following place: 
[color=red]dawnguard HQ[/color], [color=yellow]breezehome[/color], [color=purple]castle volkihar[/color], [color=red]hjerim[/color], [color=yellow]archmages quarters[/color], [color=purple]bards college[/color], [color=red]dragonsreach[/color], [color=yellow]blue palace[/color], [color=purple]palace of kings[/color], [color=red]mistveil keep[/color], [color=yellow]proudspire manor[/color], [color=purple]Arcanaeum[/color], [color=red]honeyside[/color], [color=yellow]where you meet sheogorath[/color], [color=purple]vlindrel hall[/color], [color=red]understone keep[/color], and [color=yellow]can be found on the madwomen[/color] [/center]

[line]
[center] Effects of Dawnfang and Duskfang [/center]
[center][url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OhRV_DkmnD28SEXRlZyAW2wm75aWSX34dsuO8Nr_xAg/edit]list of full future effect[/url][/center]
Dawnfang
-fire damage
-sunlight damage

Dawnfang Superior
-fire damage
-sunlight damage
-absorb health

Duskfang
-frost damage
-moonlight damage

Duskfang Superior
-frost damage
-moonlight damage
-absorb magicka

Shared Effects of all the blades:
-dawnguard rune axe enchantment (for duskfang, it does moonlight, instead of sunlight)
-dawnguard rune hammer enchantment (it does work while wielding a shield)
-soul trap (hense why it has unlimited charge)
-Meridia\'s retribution (just the explosion part of the enchantment)
[line]
[center] to temper the blade right now you will need the following: [/center][center] [color=yellow] -goat cheese wheel [/color] [/center][center] [color=red] -human heart [/color] [/center][center] [color=green] -vampire dust  [/color] [/center][center] [color=blue] -ebony ingot [/color] [/center] [center] -Daedric Smithing Perk [/center] [center] -Arcane Smithing Perk [/center]
[line]
[size=8][u] [center] [color=yellow] [b]Known Bugs[/b] [/color] [/center][/u][/size]
-when waiting/sleeping while the animation for sheathing/unsheathing is going, you can lose the blade (i dont think i can fix this issue)
-there could be a chance that the kills arent counted because of the effects killing the target before you do
[line]
[size=8][u] [center] [color=yellow] [b]Credits and Special Thanks[/b] [/color] [/center][/u][/size]
Credits:
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/553425]Teh Masterer[/url] for the scripts
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/571605]CaBaL120[/url] for the textures
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/664978]tesfan123[/url] for the mesh and the picture
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2529917]jefthereaper[/url] for writing the backstory of the blade in journal format of sheogorath himself
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3645420]ZeroEternalz[/url] for giving me a unique near death script for dawnfang/duskfang 
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/975737]camz123[/url] for inspiring me to recreate the weapon, and providing script resources (in the misc section for download)

Special thanks to the people who have helped me
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3645420]ZeroEternalz[/url] for giving me effect ideas, and supporting this mod
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2529917]Jefthereaper[/url] for giving me ideas for the weapons extra enchantments and for other stuff
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3841389]tktk1[/url] helping me with the transformation script 
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/972816]sagittarius22[/url] for scripting help
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1715621]Mujuro[/url] for helping me to make a script

if i missed anybody i am very sorry, i tried to keep track of who helped me

Please check out this mod by ZeroEternalz [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23387]Legendary Souls[/url] [/b]
author: KeizaalFeyn
